name: I Took America's LONGEST Sleeper Train: 3 Days!
description:
This week I take a ride on America's longest train ride - the Amtrak California Zephyr from Chicago to San Francisco in First Class in their Bedroom Suite.

OFFICIAL NOEL MERCH: https://www.noelphilips.com
MY PILOT VLOGS CHANNEL:  @NoelPhilipsPilotVlogs
